shortdesc.ph: Callback for setting the audio format of the callback.

section.p: When registering the audio frame observer using the method, you need to implement this callback. After successfully registering the audio frame observer, the SDK triggers this callback, and you can set the audio format through the return value of this callback.
section.note: The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the you set in the return value, and triggers the callback accordingly. The formula for calculating the sampling interval is: Sampling interval (seconds) = samplePerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: When the method call succeeds, returns an instance of , representing the mixed capture and playback audio data. See .
